00017 #ifndef _LOGGER_HPP
00018 #define _LOGGER_HPP
00019 
00020 #include <sstream>
00021 
00022 namespace ears {
00023 
00025   enum TLogLevel {logERROR, logWARNING, logINFO, logDEBUG, logDEBUG2};
00026   
00028   class Logger
00029   {
00030   public:
00032     Logger();
00033     
00035     virtual ~Logger();
00036     
00038     std::ostringstream& log( TLogLevel level = logINFO );
00039     
00041     static TLogLevel& reportingLevel();
00042     
00044     static TLogLevel fromString( const std::string& level );
00045     
00046   protected:
00048     std::ostringstream os;
00049     
00050   private:
00052     Logger( const Logger& );
00053     
00055     Logger& operator = ( const Logger& );
00056   };
00057 
00058   
00059   inline Logger::Logger()
00060   {    
00061   }
00062     
00063   
00064   inline std::ostringstream& Logger::log( TLogLevel level )
00065   {
00066     if ( level == logERROR )
00067       os << "ERROR: ";
00068     if ( level == logWARNING )
00069       os << "WARNING: ";
00070     if ( level == logDEBUG )
00071       os << "  ";
00072     if ( level == logDEBUG2 )
00073       os << "    ";
00074     return os;
00075   }
00076     
00077   
00078   inline Logger::~Logger()
00079   {
00080     os << std::endl;
00081     fprintf( stderr, "%s", os.str().c_str() );
00082     fflush( stderr );
00083   }
00084     
00085   
00086   inline TLogLevel& Logger::reportingLevel()
00087   {
00088     static TLogLevel rlevel = logINFO;
00089     return rlevel;
00090   }
00091 
00092     
00093   inline TLogLevel Logger::fromString( const std::string& level )
00094   {
00095     if (level == "debugall")
00096       return logDEBUG2;
00097     if (level == "debug")
00098       return logDEBUG;
00099     if (level == "info")
00100       return logINFO;
00101     if (level == "warning")
00102       return logWARNING;
00103     if (level == "error")
00104       return logERROR;
00105     Logger().log(logWARNING) << "Unknown logging level '" << level << "'. "
00106       << "Using INFO level as default.";
00107     return logINFO;
00108   }
00109     
00110   
00111   typedef Logger EARSLog;
00112   
00113   #define LOG(level) \
00114     if (level > EARSLog::reportingLevel()) ; \
00115     else Logger().log(level)
00116   
00117 }
00118 
00119 #endif
